column3: Inland Revenue Act, No. 24 of 2017 was amended by the Inland Revenue (Amendment)
Act, No. 10 of 2021, mainly bringing the budget proposals into law, which were
announced in November 2020 and other announcements made in January 2020
Extraordinary Gazette Notification No. 2234/6 was issued to prescribe the information
technology and enabled services which are exempted from income taxes under the
Inland Revenue (Amendment) Act, No. 10 of 2021, with effect from 01 January 2020.
